name: Flipjack
description:
Flip-a-coin tournament against incomprehensible foes.

Controls: 
Mouse

Rules:

  • Fight your way through 6 floors.
  • Each fight consists of bo3, bo5, or bo7 rounds.
  • A round is won by having the most same-side coins. So 4 heads beats 3 tails. 3 tails beats 2 heads.
  • If there is a tie, the tiebreak coin decides the winner. If there is still a tie, the round is played again.
  • You can reroll (or reflip) your coins by clicking the reflip button on the left, but you have a limited amount so use them wisely. If you only want to flip some of your coins, click on the ones you don't want to reflip.
  • After each fight, choose a card reward. Some cards provide passive effects, while others you must click on or drag coins on top of.
  • Easy mode provides an extra coin and hard mode moves the bo5 and bo7 up sooner.

Made in 48h by Jon Topielski and Prifurin for GMTK Game Jam 2022

Known Bug: restarting a game secretly carries over upgrades from previous runs so refresh to start from scratch!
